name: ZombieStryker
description:
In this Top down 2D shooter you will run and gun, slice and dice and tear your way though zombie hoards as the lovable blank slate Jason arsenal,make your way though levels to hopefully escape the apocalypse while racking up a score as you go. 

Move with  WASD
Shoot with left click
Aim with mouse
Swap weapons with numbers 1,2,3

Good Luck.
